text.content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant P as 👤 Payer
    participant M as 🛍️ Merchant
    participant PG as 🔗 Gateway
    participant ACQ as 🏦 Acquirer
    participant CN as 🌐 Network
    participant ISS as 💳 Issuer
    participant SEC as 🔒 Security Service
    participant LOG as 📜 Logger
    participant NOTI as 📢 Notification

    P->>M: Initiates payment
    M->>PG: Submit authorization request
    PG->>ACQ: Forward request
    ACQ->>CN: Route to Card Network
    CN->>ISS: Forward to Issuer

    ISS->>SEC: Request Strong Authentication
    SEC->>P: Send OTP/3DS challenge
    P->>SEC: Incorrect / timeout
    SEC->>ISS: Authentication failed

    ISS-->>CN: Declined (Auth Failed)
    CN-->>ACQ: Forward decline
    ACQ-->>PG: Forward decline
    PG-->>M: Forward decline
    M-->>P: Show authentication failure

    ISS->>LOG: Log authentication failure
    LOG->>NOTI: Notify Payer
    NOTI-->>P: Declined due to failed authentication
